name: Event Log Check
description: Checks Windows System and Application Event Logs in a relative time window. Fails on Blocklist matches or when the remaining event count exceeds a threshold. Produces report.json plus CSV summaries.

parameters.name: WindowMinutes
parameters.help: Relative time window (minutes) to look back from now.

parameters.name: LogNames
parameters.help: Log names to query. Select one or more.

parameters.name: MinLevel
parameters.help: Minimum event severity to include. None disables level filtering.

parameters.name: AllowlistCsv
parameters.help: Allowlist rules CSV (relative to test case directory).

parameters.name: BlocklistCsv
parameters.help: Blocklist rules CSV (relative to test case directory).

parameters.name: FailThreshold
parameters.help: Fail if the count of non-allowlisted events (and not blocklisted) is >= this threshold.

parameters.name: MaxEventsPerLog
parameters.help: Max events to read per log to avoid long runtimes.

parameters.name: TruncateMessageChars
parameters.help: Max characters of event message written to outputs (0 = no truncation).

parameters.name: CaptureEventsToFile
parameters.help: When true, writes artifacts/events_detail.csv with all collected events (time window filtered only). Failed events are always saved to artifacts/failed_events.csv on FAIL.
